pages.name: Entry Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/buffa_rider_core_id)Kamen Rider Buffa Core ID$(/l)

pages.title: Kamen Rider Buffa
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver_buffa)Desire Driver (Buffa)$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Anti Poison

pages.name: Zombie Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/zombie_raise_buckle)Zombie Buckle$(/l) (use in your off-hand to switch sides)

pages.title: Kamen Rider Buffa
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver_buffa)Desire Driver (Buffa)$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Desire Driver user apart from $(l:geats/riders/xgeats)XGeats$(/l) and $(l:geats/riders/dooms_geats)Dooms Geats$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Anti Poison$(br2)Zombie Buckle Effects:$(li)Anti Poison$(li)Strength II

pages.name: ZombieBoost Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/zombie_raise_buckle)Zombie Buckle$(/l) in your main hand and the $(l:geats/items/boost_raise_buckle)Boost Buckle$(/l) in your off-hand

pages.title: Kamen Rider Buffa
